author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Some braincells have just kicked into life and reminded me that one of the bascule bridges we passed through in Holland whilst using the mast-up route going north from Medemblik had a huge advertising display on the underside, for the benefit of queuing cars patiently waiting whilst we battled to get the boat pointing in the right direction against a 30kt wind in a narrow canal.

author: Phil
content:
Good!
We get too much of that junk now, both on streets and online!

They wanted to put one at the end of our lift bridge with 4-way traffic, it was voted down.

author: Willy
content: Google search shows average price at $154,000 USD per billboard.

author: Willy
content: Interesting idea of how to make money. Alas the person responsible will probably have to declare bankruptcy. Those giant TV’s are not cheap!
